
add_library(
  InfineonLib 
  OBJECT   
  infineon/Configurations/Ifx_Cfg_Ssw.c
  infineon/Configurations/Ifx_Cfg_SswBmhd.c
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/Scu/Std/IfxScuCcu.c
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Ssw/TC33A/Tricore/Ifx_Ssw_Infra.c
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Ssw/TC33A/Tricore/Ifx_Ssw_Tc0.c
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/Scu/Std/IfxScuWdt.c
)

target_include_directories(
  InfineonLib
  PUBLIC
  infineon/Configurations/
  infineon/Configurations/Debug/
  infineon/Libraries/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Platform/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Platform/Tricore/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Platform/Tricore/Compilers/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Sfr/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Sfr/TC33A/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Sfr/TC33A/_Reg/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Ssw/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Ssw/TC33A/
  infineon/Libraries/Infra/Ssw/TC33A/Tricore/
  infineon/Libraries/Service/
  infineon/Libraries/Service/CpuGeneric/
  infineon/Libraries/Service/CpuGeneric/If/
  infineon/Libraries/Service/CpuGeneric/If/Ccu6If/
  infineon/Libraries/Service/CpuGeneric/StdIf/
  infineon/Libraries/Service/CpuGeneric/SysSe/

  infineon/Libraries/Service/CpuGeneric/SysSe/Math/

  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/Src/Std/
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/Stm/
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/Stm/Std/
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/Stm/Timer/

  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/_Impl/
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/_Lib/
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/_Lib/DataHandling/
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/_Lib/InternalMux/
  infineon/Libraries/iLLD/TC33A/Tricore/_PinMap/
)

target_compile_features(InfineonLib PRIVATE c_std_99)
